```{r}
df1_new <- df1[, c(1, 45:64)]
colnames(df1_new)[1] <- "country"
df2_new <- df2[, c(1, 45:64)]
colnames(df2_new)[1] <- "country"
df3_new <- df3[, c(1, 45:64)]
colnames(df3_new)[1] <- "country"


df_final <- merge(df, df1_new, by=c("country"), all.x=TRUE)
df_final <- merge(df_final, df2_new, by=c("country"), all.x=TRUE)
df_final <- merge(df_final, df3_new, by=c("country"), all.x=TRUE)
df_final$collected_year_new <- trunc(df_final$collected_year)
df_final$collected_year_new[is.na(df_final$collected_year_new)] <- 0
```

```{r}
### indSES

## Create new variables indSES_new and ethn_new_indSES for analysis

# indSES studies with values:

# 2006 Tsai study1 (1 - 5)
# 2006 Tsai study2 (1 - 5)
# 2014 Koopman-Holm study2 (1 - 5)
# 2014 Koopman-Holm study3 (1 - 5)
# 2018 Bencharit study3 (1 - 5)
# 2018 Bencharit study4a (1 - 5)
# 2013 Scheibe study1 (1 - 5)
# 2016 Koc study1 (1 - 10)
# 2016 Tsai study3 (1 - 5)
# 2018 Koc Identity Integration study1 (1 - 10)
# Unpublished Yi study1 (1 - 10)

# Create new variables for analysis
df_final$indSES_new <- df_final$indSES
df_final$indincome_new <- df_final$indincome
# Convert to numeric
df_final$indSES_new <- as.numeric(as.character(df_final$indSES_new))
df_final$indincome_new <- as.numeric(as.character(df_final$indincome_new))
# Add 2013 Scheibe study1 to indSES ####NOTE REMOVE THIS AFTER NEW FILE UPDATE
df_final$indSES_new[df_final$paper_study == "2013 Scheibe study1"] <- df_final$indincome_new[df_final$paper_study == "2013 Scheibe study1"]
# Convert appropriate values to NA
df_final$indSES_new[df_final$indSES_new == 6 | df_final$indSES_new == 333 | df_final$indSES_new == 888] <- NA
# Standardize values 0.2 - 1

df_final$indSES_new <- ifelse(df_final$paper_study == "2016 Koc study1", 1+4/9*(df_final$indSES_new-1), df_final$indSES_new)
df_final$indSES_new <- ifelse(df_final$paper_study == "2018 Koc Identity Integration study1", 1+4/9*(df_final$indSES_new-1), df_final$indSES_new)
df_final$indSES_new <- ifelse(df_final$paper_study == "Unpublished Yi study1", 1+4/9*(df_final$indSES_new-1), df_final$indSES_new)



# Create ethn_new_indSES to categorize the studies' ethnicities for analysis
df_final$ethn_new_indSES <- "Other"
df_final$ethn_new_indSES[df_final$ethn == "European American"] = "European American"
df_final$ethn_new_indSES[df_final$ethn == "Chinese American"  | df_final$ethn == "East Asian American"] = "Asian American"
df_final$ethn_new_indSES[df_final$ethn == "Japanese" | df_final$ethn == "Korean" | df_final$ethn == "Taiwanese" | df_final$ethn == "Chinese"] = "East Asian"
df_final$ethn_new_indSES[df_final$ethn == "Hong Kong Chinese"] = "Hong Kong Chinese"
df_final$ethn_new_indSES[df_final$ethn == "Turkish" | df_final$ethn == "Swedish" | df_final$ethn == "German" | df_final$ethn == "British" | df_final$ethn == "French" | df_final$ethn == "Bulgarian" | df_final$ethn == "Russian" | df_final$ethn == "Moldovian"] = "European"

unique(df_final$indSES_new)

```
